1.0.0.name: wordpress/ilisa
1.0.0.description: ilisa is a clean and minimal WordPress Theme that can be easily used as a personal portfolio or a business website. A responsive layout optimizes the theme for mobile devices. To customize the theme you can choose your own link-color, logo and favicon.
